item.title: Mary Gary | Scamalot Episode #4
item.description:
Mary Gary | Scamalot Episode #4

Comedian James Veitch knows exactly how to tick off an internet scammer. 'Scamalot' is a new weekly series from Mashable! Subscribe for new episodes every Friday: http://on.mash.to/subscribe Watch more episodes: http://on.mash.to/ScamalotPlaylist Based on the book "Dot Con" by James Veitch.
